20110104023738.000|20110104023740.000|CC1|TRACES OF CANCER IN YOUR BODY.

20110104023741.000|20110104023742.000|CC1|RELEASES CANCER CELLS INTO YOUR

20110104023744.000|20110104023746.000|CC1|RARE CELLS.                     
20110104023746.000|20110104023748.000|CC1|>> FOR EVERY ONE TUMOR CELL IN  
20110104023748.000|20110104023750.000|CC1|THE BLOOD, THERE'S OVER A       
20110104023750.000|20110104023751.000|CC1|BILLION NORMAL BLOOD CELLS IN   
20110104023751.000|20110104023752.000|CC1|THE CIRCULATION.

20110104023755.000|20110104023756.000|CC1|DEVELOPING A TEST THAT CAN PULL 
20110104023756.000|20110104023757.000|CC1|OUT ONE IN A BILLION CELLS.     
20110104023757.000|20110104023758.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THE PATIENT'S BLOOD
20110104023758.000|20110104023759.000|CC1|IS RUN ACROSS A SPECIAL         
20110104023759.000|20110104023801.000|CC1|MICROCHIP COVERED WITH TINY     
20110104023801.000|20110104023802.000|CC1|BRISTLES TREATED WITH A GLUE    
20110104023802.000|20110104023804.000|CC1|THAT BINDS TO CANCER CELLS.     
20110104023804.000|20110104023807.000|CC1|WHEN THE BLOOD PASSES THROUGH   
20110104023807.000|20110104023809.000|CC1|THOSE BRISTLES, THE CANCER CELLS
20110104023809.000|20110104023810.000|CC1|STICK, WHILE THE HEALTHY CELLS  
20110104023810.000|20110104023812.000|CC1|PASS ON THROUGH.

20110104023813.000|20110104023815.000|CC1|USED TO REFLECT PEOPLE'S
